Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Jonathan Montalvo to be placed on the eligible list for employment as a university police officer
Summary: Authorizes Jonathan Montalvo to be placed on the eligible list for employment for the state university of New York police.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Jonathan Montalvo to be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time university police officer for the state university of New York police
